name: Reason for Being Solitary, Ouka
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, choose 1 of your opponent's characters in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character onto any position of your back stage.
flavor_text: I swore that I would dedicate my entire life for the extermination of witches and for the sake of witches' victims.

name: Acting Manager's Aide, Isuzu
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 character, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's clock." (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: How about going to the amusement park with me next Sunday?

name: First Princess of Maple Land, Latifah
ability: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When you level up, put all markers underneath this card into your waiting room.

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of markers underneath this card ×1000.
flavor_text: Please become the manager of "Amagi Brilliant Park".

name: Fairy of Water, Muse
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Ah, Kanie-san! Good morning!

name: First Time at a School Festival, Isuzu & Latifah
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 characters, this card gets +1500 power, and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Welcome to Amagi Brilliant Park!" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: Latifah: "I'd love to walk around!"

name: The Four Girls of "Elementario", Muse/Salama/Sylphy/Kobory
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your opponent's stock into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, choose 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it into his or her stock.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.
【ACT】 [(1)] This card gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Muse: "Ah, I'll show you around! It's quite easy to get lost after all."

name: Welcome to Amagi Brilliant Park!
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room with level equal to or lower than your level, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: AmaBri's summer unveiling - the pool's opening!

name: The AmaBri Triumvirate, Moffle & Macaron & Tiramy
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 characters among those cards ×1000.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, 【REST】 all of your other 【STAND】 characters.
flavor_text: Moffle: "Cold tomato and cold tofu. I also want a random selection of yakitori."

name: Duty of the Two, Isuzu & Seiya
ability: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavor_text: Isuzu: "It's so that you can't escape."

name: Maple Kitchen, Latifah
ability: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from hand.
flavor_text: Oh, it looks like you're having fun~♪

name: Girl of Healing, Asia
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 characters get +1500 power.
【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "First Friend" is in your climax area, all of your characters get +1500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: I'll treat you now. Please show me the injured area.

name: Red-Haired Ruin Princess, Rias
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Believing in the Same Dream" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Alright, I'll make you into a man.

name: The Ultimate S, Akeno
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavor_text: You can fawn on me even more, you know?

name: Reward Time, Rias
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】 ability, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavor_text: Alright. This chest is yours, only from now until I count to five.

name: Devilish Smile, Rias
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character in your hand with level equal to or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage, and that character gets +1 soul and 《Demon》 until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 characters you have ×1000.
flavor_text: If you're going to die anyway, I'll take your life. Live for my sake.

name: Cross-Dressing Half-Vampire, Gasper
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I feel like I've somehow gained just a little bit of courage.

name: Quiet White Cat, Koneko
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it at the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that card.
flavor_text: …Blast away.

name: Silver-Haired Former Valkyrie, Rossweisse
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: Amazing! Ah, you can get this much from a devil…!

name: Master-and-Servant Relationship, Rias & Issei
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Issei: "…It's my dream to become the strongest Pawn."

name: Gigantis Dragon's Contractor, Asia
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavor_text: …Hear my call, Golden King. Crawl the earth and receive my reward! Come out!

name: Holy Sword User, Xenovia
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 characters among those cards ×1000.
flavor_text: Please bring both Asia and I along.

name: Swift Sword Skills, Yuuto
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Answer my thoughts! Sword Birth!

name: Believing in the Same Dream
ability: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: Rias: "…Become strong. I too, believe in your dream to become the strongest Pawn."

name: First Friend
ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavor_text: I have a dream. To do things like buy flowers, buy books, and talk… together with a friend…

name: Goddess in Swimwear, Rias
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 character, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled. Return the revealed card to its original place)

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavor_text: No! Issei's body belongs to me!

name: High-Class Charms, Rias
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Demon》 characters.
flavor_text: Fufufu, it's fine. You don't have to say a thing.

name: Occult Research Club Head, Rias
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "A Voice Heard" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters and this card, and they get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavor_text: We, the Occult Research Club, welcome you.

name: A Voice Heard
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: Well then, my cute servant devils! As a Gremory family member, I will blast away the enemies in front of us for everyone!

name: Insane and Beautiful〈Nightmare〉, Kurumi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or deck, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Insane and Beautiful〈Nightmare〉, Kurumi", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Journey to the Afterlife" is in your climax area, perform the following action. "If your clock has 2 or less cards, choose up to 1 card in your waiting room, return it to your deck, and shuffle your deck. If your clock has 3 or more cards, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into his or her waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: You alone are different. You alone are special.

name: White-Winged〈Angel〉, Origami
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavor_text: I've said it before. I'll make sure to defeat… all you Spirits.

name: Elegant Clockwork, Kurumi
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if your clock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +2000 power.
【CONT】 If your clock has 3 or more cards, this card gets +1 soul.
flavor_text: I am a Spirit.

name: Pure 〈Princess〉, Touka
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your back stage.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: …A name, huh… I don't have anything like that.

name: 〈Ifrit〉of Burning Affection, Kotori
ability: 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Get on your knees. It's time to start the punishment of love.

name: Timid 〈Hermit〉, Yoshino
ability: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Yoshinon is… my hero...

name: 〈Diva〉of Temptation, Miku
ability: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 cost 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of his or her deck.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Shall we keep this secret between the two of us?

name: 〈Berserk〉of the Whirlwind, Kaguya & Yuzuru
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text:
Kaguya: "Shall we do it?"
Yuzuru: "Affirmative. Let's do it."

name: Savior of the Girls' Minds, Shidou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Fantasia Bunko》 characters you have ×500.

【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room into your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn.
flavor_text: So, please lend me your help! I… need you!

name: Saddled with the Past, Origami
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Attack of Steel" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."
flavor_text: Five years ago… my parents died… because of Spirits.

name: Demon King's Love
ability: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 trait of a character on your opponent's stage, and all of your opponent's characters lose that trait until end of turn.
flavor_text: Become delicious. Moe moe kyun.

name: Journey to the Afterlife
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: For ---'s sake… please die.

name: Attack of Steel
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: Objective supplemented. Now beginning the extermination of the identifier 〈Hermit〉 .

name: Maids of Temptation, Origami & Kurumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [(5) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card’s attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavor_text: Kurumi: "How is this? Does it suit me?"

name: Mysterious Girl, Touka
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that charcacter gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: …Is it really fine for me to live?

name: A Cute Side, Kurumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Ufufu, then I have a monopoly over Shidou-san's heart.

name: Journey to Find "Relics of a Legendary Hero", Ryner & Ferris
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Magic》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text:
Ryner: "There's a question I've had on my mind for a loooong time… Can I ask you something?"
Ferris: "No. I'm busy with dango right now."

name: High School Girl from Jindai High, Kaname
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into the waiting room from your stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Whispered》 character equal to or lower than your level, put it on any postion of your stage as 【REST】, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: As I thought, you're strange.

name: Tuatha de Danaan's Captain, Teresa
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Beginning of the Battle" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, and you have 4 or more other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Mithril》 characters, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to three cards from among them, put them into your opponent's waiting room, return the rest to your opponent's deck, and your opponent shuffles his or her deck.
flavor_text: Ah… Sorry.

name: Call Sign Urzu-7, Sousuke
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Mithril》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: Amateur…? I'm no amateur. I'm a specialist.

name: ARX-8 Laevatein
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +8500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot receive damage by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters."
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Call Sign Urzu-7, Sousuke" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Beginning of the Battle
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Stylish Getup, Bonta-kun
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
【CONT】 All of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 characters get +500 power.

name: Stand by Me Always, Sousuke & Kaname
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Whispered》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sousuke: "If I have you, I don't need any weapons."

name: Coffin-Carrying Wizard, Chaika
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Magic》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: Have no ability. I can. Do it together. This is all.

name: Sibling Affection, Suzuka
ability: 【AUTO】 When your trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Novel》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Towano Chikai's Rival, Mai
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Novel》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Novel》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: T-This is humiliating…! An autograph…? I'm the one who wants yours!

name: Interview for Valentine? Suzuka
ability: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn.
flavor_text: There are no oversights for my lovey-dovey Valentine with Onii-chan...!

name: Blushing Younger Sister, Suzuka
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Novel》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Love Story of the "Princess"" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Novel》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Illustrator from United Kingdom, Ahegao W Peace Sensei
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players reveal the top card of their deck. If your card revealed by this effect has level equal to or higher than your opponent's card revealed by this effect, you may choose 1 of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put it into his or her waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Love Story of the "Princess"
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: I love Onii-chan from the bottom of my heart. I really do.

name: Younger-Sister-Style Voice, Sakura
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 during battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: Sensei, can I call you Onii-chan?

name: Mai & Ahegao W Peace Sensei in Uniform
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "Dangerous Younger Sister, Suzuka" get +1 soul.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Dangerous Younger Sister, Suzuka" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Dangerous Younger Sister, Suzuka" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Dangerous Younger Sister, Suzuka

ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase.

name: Silver-Haired Necromancer, Eu
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed into your waiting room from the stage, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 yellow climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Solid Situation Panic" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Shinobi》 characters in your back stage.

name: Broken Heart Magnum, Haruna
ability: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".

ability: 【CONT】 If your deck has 5 or less cards, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

name: Top Student of the Academic Year, Taeko
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +2 soul until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

ability: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 character in your hand with level equal to or lower than your level, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Dual-Personality Vampire Ninja, Saras
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck."

flavor_text: Yes. Mafuyu loves games.

name: Fragrance of Yuri, Chizuru
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Student Council》 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Aka-chan. There's no other.

name: Dazzling, Minatsu
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Student Council》, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Mafuyu…

name: In Slumber
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: Oh? Mhm... Mafuyu isn't sleeping...

name: Irreplaceable Daily Life
ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavor_text: All: "We love you."

name: President of the Universe, Kurimu
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players reveal the top card of their deck. If your card revealed by this effect has level equal to or higher than your opponent's card revealed by this effect, this card gets +4500 power until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: This card spells victory to whoever draws it!

name: Ringing Declaration, Kurimu
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Student Council's Discretion" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Student Council》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: A bird does not foul the nest it is about to leave!

name: I Am Echo of Death
ability: Brainstorm Flip over 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Choose 1 level X or lower 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Student Council》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《Student Council》 characters revealed among those cards. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: I'm… your brother.

name: Student Council's Discretion
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: The important thing isn't winning or losing! It's whether you worked hard or not!

name: Genius Mage & Swordswoman, Lina
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

【ACT】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card."
flavor_text: I'm Lina. Lina Inverse. As you can see, I'm a mage.

name: Fulfilled Promise, Natsume & Harutora
ability: 【CONT】 If this card has a marker underneath it, this card gets +3000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Fulfilled Promise, Natsume & Harutora" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text: Natsume: "Now you belong to me."
